item.title: By: footdr4u

item.description: I bought my nieces hoverboards for Christmas and the chargers stopped charging after 1 month. They sent new ones right out! Go Gotrax!

I bought my nieces hoverboards for Christmas and the chargers stopped charging after 1 month. They sent
new ones right out! Go Gotrax!

item.title: By: jilleenbishop
item.dc:creator: jilleenbishop
item.description: One of my kids broke a charging prong. I contacted customer service and within a week we had a new hoverboard. Quick communication and friendly service. Happy customer!
item.content:encoded: One of my kids broke a charging prong. I contacted customer service and within a week we had a new hoverboard. Quick communication and friendly service. Happy customer!

item.title: By: Marty B.
item.dc:creator: Marty B.
item.description: I got this hoverboard for my son but I'm the one that uses it now. Tons of fun, love the lights on the front

item.title: By: dantie22
item.dc:creator: dantie22
item.description: Santa brought my 6 year old the Hoverfly Eco,has hardly gotten off of it since.It’s off the hook awesome!Out of the box ready,and NO PROBLEMS AT ALL!Excellent price,even better!
item.content:encoded: Santa brought my 6 year old the Hoverfly Eco,has hardly gotten off of it since.It’s off the hook awesome!Out of the box ready,and NO PROBLEMS AT ALL!Excellent price,even better!
